mil3.7.10:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.7.10:1.3_0: ‘Not long, it’s a hundred leagues long, or even just 65 to 80 kilometers, how could there be such a tree trunk?’”
mil3.7.10:2.1_0: “What do you think, great king? Do you think, ‘There are five hundred leagues long’?”
mil3.7.10:2.3_0: “Great king, doesn’t that 65 to 80 leagues long, or 65 to 80 kilometers?”
